Translations.Text: Say ja inspirovat ze zoskupit jinns listened potom said ‘My heard nadherny Quran
It guides righteousness my have verit v it my never set any idols our Lord
‘"The Vela High bol our iba Lord He never had mate nor syn
It bol foolish among us pouzivat utter such nonsense GOD
‘My myslienka ze neither humans nor jinns possibly utter laicky GOD
Human beings pouzivat seek power jinn beings they len afflicted them a lot z adversity
‘They myslienka iba mat rad ona myslienka GOD nie send iny (posol)
‘My touched heaven zalozit it filled formidable guards projectiles
‘My pouzivat zasadat there v poradie spy Ktokolvek listens pursued mocny projectile
‘My nie have idea nieco zly zamyslat inhabitants Zem al if ich Lord wills redeem them
Some z us bol righteous some bol menej than righteous; my nasledovat various chodnicek
‘My zauzlit full lepsie my never run GOD Zem; my never run escape
When my heard guidance my verit therein. Ktokolvek verit v jeho Lord never fear any injustice nor any affliction
